title: FeedbackEvent
description: Schema for a user feedback event published by a gateway.

id.description: A unique identifier for this feedback submission.

session_id.description: The A2A session ID associated with the task.

task_id.description: The ID of the task this feedback is for.

user_id.description: The identifier of the user who provided the feedback.

rating.description: The rating provided by the user.

comment.description: Optional text comment provided by the user.

created_time.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp (UTC) when the feedback was submitted.

gateway_id.description: The ID of the gateway that collected the feedback.
